articles.author: David Comerford
articles.title: Lionel Messi knows Alexis Mac Allister weapon Mohamed Salah shares as Liverpool may soon benefit - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Liverpool transfer 'target' Alexis Mac Allister shares a Mohamed Salah trait Jürgen Klopp called 'important', and Lionel Messi has already been the beneficiary.
articles.content:
Right now, Brighton midfielder Alexis Mac Allister looks like the prime candidate to be Liverpool's first summer signing. 
Fabrizio Romano reported on Tuesday that the Reds have 'almost agreed' pers… [+4484 chars]
